Avoir un projet clair et bien défini est: A clear and well defined project is a prerequisite for a good start in your job search. It's an excellent way of finding motivation and boost your job search.
Commencer sa recherche d'emploi implique: Starting your job search means looking at employment numbers, investigating the target job. You can start your search by meeting people or defining your project. It doesn't have to be sending applications.
Le marché du travail considère les offre: Employment competition considers the job offers and recruitments in the département for your profession but also the other candidates that can be your competitors. A "good employment market" for you is a job market where there are more job opportunities than competitors.
Préparer votre CV, trouver des offres d': Prepare your CV, find job offers or send an application, obtain an interview and finally a hiring proposal.
Travailler dans un domaine qui vous moti: Working in a domain that you like is not only enjoyable but also more efficient. Employers know that and as such your motivation is very important to get hired.
Une formation validée par une certificat: A training validated by a certification or a diploma can make the difference for recruiters. It's even compulsory for some jobs.
